pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Shampoo
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf C2 Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Shampoo with Neutralising Anti-Brass Technology that can remove yellow gold tones while cleansing hair and visibly improved hair quality.

Thanks to its unique formula with blue violet pigments and NEUTRALISING Anti-Brass Technology, Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Shampoo removes unwanted yellow gold tones while cleansing and strengthening blonde hair:


- A cooler, brighter and healthy looking blonde.

- Suitable for use on blonde, lightened or highlighted hair.

- Ideal for reviving and brightening naturally grey or whitehair and toning sun bleached hair.

Suitable For: Suitable for use on blonde, lightened or highlighted hair.

Size: 200mL

Ingredients

Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Chloride, Laureth-2, Glycol Distearate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Laureth-4, Parfum, Polyquaternium-10, Salicylic Acid, Cocamidopropyl, Betaine, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Acid Violet 43, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexyl Salicylate, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol.

Directions

Massage into wet hair instead of your normal shampoo. Leave in for 1-5 minutes and rinse thoroughly.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Not recommended for use on highly bleached or very porous hair. Do not allow Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Shampoo to come into contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. In the event of spillage, rinse immediately with cold water.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
